assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: PPS receives research support from Emtora Biosciences, Freenome Holdings, Janssen Pharmaceuticals Inc., Pfizer Inc. and the PTEN Research foundation. HH is on the scientific advisory boards for Invitae, Promega, and Genome Medical and has stock/stock options in Genome Medical and GI OnDemand. The remaining authors declare no conflict of interest related to this research.

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: This project was reviewed and approved by The Ohio State University Institutional Review Board (protocol 2021E0849).

assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: Given the retrospective nature of this study and minimal risk of reporting aggregate data, a waiver of informed consent was granted by the Institutional Review Board.

assertion.label: Free to read
assertion.name: free
assertion.value: This content has been made available to all.
